resources.string:
Layer Zero App is a self reflection tool that encourages you to fill reflection logs.
Reflection logs are mini surveys with open ended questions.
They are designed to make you think deeper on your experience of sharing on social media.

The first question of the reflection log asks you for a brief description of the experience.
Think of it like a journal. Write down whatever you like. Just share your thoughts either on the experience of sharing or experience of the content.

Following, reflection log includes questions for three different aspects of the experience you just described: sensory, emotional, intellectual.
Here is a place for you to think deeper. Take a breath. Take a new perspective.

Think about your experience from a sensory perspective. Rate the effect of sensory input on your experience and add your comments.
Think about not just what you saw, but also about what you heard, touched, smelt, and tasted.

Think about your experience from an emotional perspective. Rate the effect of emotional input on your experience and add your comments.
Think about your feelings, dig even deeper.

Think about your experience from an intellectual perspective. Rate the effect of intellectual input on your experience and add your comments..
Think about thoughts.

Open your Layer Zero App to revisit your reflections about your experiences on social media.
You can use AROUND ME tab to explore your past reflections around your current location.
Visualizations you see on your gallery are generated based on your ratings to give you an overview.
Enjoy your experience!
